body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, coach painter and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of John W. Applegate and Martha J. Applegate. Coach painter in Nelson County in 1860. Served in the 9th Kentucky Volunteer Mounted Infantry Regiment (C.S.A.) as fourth sergeant from October 2, 1861, and second lieutenant from June 30, 1863.
